description:
The above workshop will be conducted by Chainlink.
Registration Fee: Rs.500/-
The topics include
1. Chainlink Bootcamp,
 2. Learn about EVM Chains, how they work. 
 3. Build smart contracts using Solidity, an EVM Language.
 4. Build Hybrid smart contracts using Chainlink and Solidity. 
 5.Create NFTs with randomness using Chainlink VRF.
 Time Period : 7 hours (excluding breaks). 
 NOTE: During UPI Payment, Add note as blockchain_YOURNAME

The workshop will be conducted by UXMINT.
Registration Fee: Rs.750/-
The topics that will be covered includes,
1. Introduction about design.
2. What is UX and UI?
3. Process of Digital Design.
4. Problem Solving - Team Activity.
5. Discussion on the Team Activity.
6. Industry Expectations and Career in Design.
Time Period : 6 hours (excluding breaks).
 NOTE: During UPI Payment, Add note as UI_YOURNAME

This cybersecurity workshop will be conducted by BriskInfosec.
Registration Fee: Rs.750/-
 NOTE: During UPI Payment, Add note as cybersecurity_YOURNAME
